name: Zombie Vikings
description: From the creators of indie smash hit Stick It to The Man! comes a new one to four-player co-op stab-you-in-the-gut-a-thon. Embark on a dead funny adventure with the Zombie Vikings. A putrid posse sent on a mission through the most epic of worlds to retrieve Odinâ€™s lost eye.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual-Core 2.1 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 520 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
